# The `SimpleCompiler` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Simple compile functor: Takes a single IR module and returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objectfile">ObjectFile</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Simple compile functor: Takes a single IR module and returns an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objectfile">ObjectFile</a>.

This compiler supports a single compilation thread and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> only. For multithreaded compilation, use <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/concurrentircompiler">ConcurrentIRCompiler</a> below.

Definition at line 36 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/compileutils-h">CompileUtils.h</a>.
